title: How MEV Staking Works
subtitle: Our sophisticated MEV bot infrastructure generates consistent returns by capturing Maximum Extractable Value opportunities across the Solana ecosystem.

step1.title: Connect & Stake
step1.description: Connect your Solana wallet and stake SOL, USDC, USDT, or meme tokens with our platform.

step2.title: MEV Bot Deployment
step2.description: Your staked funds are deployed across our MEV bot infrastructure to capture arbitrage opportunities.

step3.title: Value Extraction
step3.description: Our bots identify and execute profitable trades, liquidations, and arbitrage across Solana DEXs.

step4.title: Reward Distribution
step4.description: Earn 1% daily rewards from MEV profits. Referral rewards are automatically staked.

cta.title: Ready to Start Earning?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of stakers earning daily rewards from MEV opportunities
